net.truelicense.api

Interface LicenseManagementContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClassLoaderProvider, CodecProvider, LicenseFactory, LicenseManagementSubjectProvider

    public interface LicenseManagementContext
extends ClassLoaderProvider, CodecProvider, LicenseFactory, LicenseManagementSubjectProvider
    A context for license management. Use this context to configure and build a vendor license manager or a consumer license manager.
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConsumerLicenseManagerBuilder consumer()
      Returns a builder for a consumer license manager.
      Store memoryStore()
      Returns a new memory store.
      Store pathStore(Path path)
      Returns a store for the given path.
      Source resource(String name)
      Returns a source which loads the resource with the given name.
      Source stdin()
      Returns a source which reads from standard input without ever closing it.
      Sink stdout()
      Returns a sink which writes to standard output without ever closing it.
      Store systemPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage)
      Returns a store for the system preferences node for the package of the given class.
      Store userPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage)
      Returns a store for the user preferences node for the package of the given class.
      VendorLicenseManagerBuilder vendor()
      Returns a builder for a vendor license manager.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.truelicense.api.misc.ClassLoaderProvider

    • Method Detail

      • consumer

        ConsumerLicenseManagerBuilder consumer()
        Returns a builder for a consumer license manager. Call its Builder.build() method to build the configured consumer license manager.

      • memoryStore

        Store memoryStore()
        Returns a new memory store.

      • pathStore

        Store pathStore(Path path)
        Returns a store for the given path.

      • resource

        Source resource(String name)
        Returns a source which loads the resource with the given name. The provided string should be computed on demand from an obfuscated form, e.g. by processing it with the TrueLicense Maven Plugin.

        The resource will get loaded using the class loader which is returned by the method ClassLoaderProvider.classLoader().

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resource to load.
        Returns:
        A source which loads the resource with the given name.

      • stdin

        Source stdin()
        Returns a source which reads from standard input without ever closing it.

      • stdout

        Sink stdout()
        Returns a sink which writes to standard output without ever closing it.

      • systemPreferencesStore

        Store systemPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage)
        Returns a store for the system preferences node for the package of the given class. Note that the class should be excluded from byte code obfuscation or otherwise you might use an unintended store location and risk a collision with third party software.

        The store will use the license subject as its key in the preferences node.

      • userPreferencesStore

        Store userPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage)
        Returns a store for the user preferences node for the package of the given class. Note that the class should be excluded from byte code obfuscation or otherwise you might use an unintended store location and risk a collision with third party software.

        The store will use the license subject as its key in the preferences node.

      • vendor

        VendorLicenseManagerBuilder vendor()
        Returns a builder for a vendor license manager. Call its Builder.build() method to build the configured vendor license manager.
